about_the_game:
Use your own music to create unique Rhythm Rift stages! Drag and drop monsters, vibe chains and traps while previewing your music and gameplay live in the Rifted level editor.

Publish your creation directly to Steam Workshop to share with the Rift of the NecroDancer community!

Features:

  • All monsters, traps, food and level design ingredients from Rift of the NecroDancer at your fingertips.

  • Drag and drop, copy paste sections and automatically replace notes with ease.

  • Supports up to 48 subdivisions of each beat.

  • Includes support for Rhythm Rift tracks with varying BPM.

  • Pick a character to bop along to your jams!

  • Create your own album art and background videos to truly make it yours!

Please note: This level editor only supports the creation of Rhythm Rift tracks, and not mini games or boss battles.
